alert.note: Alert for Adams (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 24 at 8:58AM CST until December 24 at 11:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibilities are a half mile or less in the northern half of Adams County and 1 to 3 miles in southern Adams County. As the morning progresses, visibilities will gradually improve across the northern part of the Adams County. * WHERE...Adams County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
